summary: The document comprises payroll authorization forms and related documents for Mary Susan Grimes, detailing her employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) as a researcher. It includes her position title, salary, and a partially redacted social security number for privacy. Additionally, it references the Assassination Records Review Board's decision to delay the release of certain records, balancing historical interest against privacy and national security concerns.
key_findings: Mary Susan Grimes served as a researcher for the House Select Committee on Assassinations.
Privacy measures led to the redaction of her social security number in the documents.
The Assassination Records Review Board opted to postpone releasing some information, emphasizing historical value and the lack of risk to national security or individual privacy.
Included documents are payroll authorization forms, a certificate of relationship/nonrelationship to any current Member of Congress, and a low earnings report.
